## GAD-7 vs BIS-15

The process of comparing two psychological assessment instruments can be a challenging task, especially when it comes to the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Barratt Impulsiveness Scale 15 (BIS-15). However, with the Harmony software, the process is simplified, accurate and efficient. It uses artificial intelligence and natural language processing to spot similarities and differences between the questions in GAD-7 and BIS-15, and determine a percentage match. So if you're looking for a comprehensive GAD-7 vs BIS-15 comparison, Harmony is your ultimate tool. Harmony simplifies the comparison process by offering an extensive database that contains different instruments, including GAD-7 and BIS-15. The user-friendly interface allows you to easily navigate, select the instruments you want to compare or even drop your own instruments in a PDF format. This feature-rich web-based tool doesn't stop there. It also supports multiple languages, thus accommodating for cross-language harmonisation. Such powerful features make the GAD-7 vs BIS-15 comparison a smooth process. Employing Harmony for the GAD-7 vs BIS-15 comparison will not only save time for psychologists, but also ensure that results are highly accurate to aid in their research and study. This way, researchers can make well-informed decisions and analysis based on the comparison results provided by Harmony. The tool goes beyond just being a utility in research, to being an indispensable asset in the field of psychology research. Get started with Harmony today and explore the benefits of using an AI-powered tool in harmonising questionnaire items.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and BIS-15

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and BIS-15 into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just BIS-15 into Harmony</a> - compare BIS-15 with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
